short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create/Follow links that point to selected text in a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HyperAnchor helps users to share part of webpages by creating/following links that point to the selected text in a webpage.

How to use it:
Select some text in the webpage then open the context menu (right click) and click on "Copy hyper anchor to clipboard".

Your clipboard will now contain an hyper anchor link: "https://github.com/mtarld/hyper-anchor?hyper-anchor=%F0%A2%B2%86%F0%90%99%A1%E9%B5%A3%F0%93%81%AF%E8%BB%99%E9[...]"

You - or another user that have HyperAnchor extension installed - can now follow that link. 
By following that link, the browser will automatically select and scroll to the selected text used to create the link.
